topic.title: Migrating to IBM Business Automation Manager Open Editions version 9.1

body.p: This section describes the migration of existing version 9.0.x applications to version 9.1.1 of IBM Business Automation Manager Open Editions.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The following tools are required to migrate to BAMOE version 9.1.1:

ul.li: Apache Maven 3.9.6 or later is installed.
Visual Studio Code IDE latest version
IBM BAMOE Developer Tools latest version of VS Code IDE extensions

section.p: This section describes the process to migrate your projects from version 9.0.x to 9.1.1. Before you start, ensure that you have installed or updated all prerequisite tools.

This migration guide will show two ways of migrating your project. The first, by creating a new project from scratch and moving your existing assets to it. The second, by updating an existing BAMOE version 9.0.x project. You will start by setting up the Maven configuration.
